overview:
Marketing Manager and Co-Founder of BeQRious, Inc.

Guy has been involved with Start Ups throughout his 16 year career. He was one of the first employees to work on the Microsoft Sidewalk site as well as one of the original 20 employees of HotJobs.

After a brief stint in helping two Real Estate companies open new offices and territories, Guy went back to his start up roots becoming a Co-Founder of Adcirrus, an online and mobile ad network. Once he left Adcirrus, he joined BeQRious as the Marketing Manager. In this role he is responsible for getting the message out about BeQRious and their other sites CustomQRCodes.com, QRNibbles and QRCodeTracking.com. He is proficient in Social Media, Sales and Operations.

Guy graduated with Bachelor of Arts and Sciences degree from the University of Dayton. He received his MBA from Baruch College, Zicklin School of Business
